description: A collection of circles in a sideways teardrop-shaped formation with the point on the left side of the picture; on top of the right end of the formation, there is another, smaller sideways teardrop-shaped formation with the point on the right side. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is an orange triangle on the left side of the larger teardrop-shaped formation and a brown triangle above the center.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
